quizDescription: Test your knowledge about the game of football (soccer) and its history!

questions.question: In which country did football (soccer) originate?
questions.explanation: Football (soccer) originated in England, where the modern rules of the game were established.

questions.question: Which international tournament is held every four years and is one of the most prestigious events in football?
questions.explanation: The FIFA World Cup is an international football tournament held every four years, bringing together teams from around the world to compete for the title of world champions.

questions.question: Which player is often referred to as 'The King of Football' and is widely regarded as one of the greatest footballers of all time?
questions.explanation: Pele, a Brazilian football legend, is often referred to as 'The King of Football' and is widely regarded as one of the greatest players in the history of the sport.

questions.question: Which football club has won the most UEFA Champions League titles?
questions.explanation: Real Madrid is the football club that has won the most UEFA Champions League titles, with 13 championships as of the 2021-2022 season.

questions.question: Which player is known for his famous 'hand of god' goal and his remarkable 'Goal of the Century' in the 1986 FIFA World Cup?
questions.explanation: Diego Maradona, an Argentine football legend, is known for his infamous 'hand of god' goal and his extraordinary 'Goal of the Century' during the 1986 FIFA World Cup.

questions.question: Which football club is based in Catalonia and has a fierce rivalry with Real Madrid?
questions.explanation: FC Barcelona, commonly known as Barcelona, is a football club based in Catalonia, Spain, and they have a fierce rivalry with Real Madrid, known as 'El Clasico.'

questions.question: Which player is known for his record-breaking transfer from FC Barcelona to Paris Saint-Germain (PSG)?
questions.explanation: Neymar Jr., a Brazilian forward, is known for his record-breaking transfer from FC Barcelona to Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) in 2017.

questions.question: Which national team won the 2018 FIFA World Cup held in Russia?
questions.explanation: The French national team won the 2018 FIFA World Cup, defeating Croatia in the final to claim their second world championship.

questions.question: Which player is known for his incredible dribbling skills and is often referred to as 'The Magician'?
questions.explanation: Lionel Messi, an Argentine forward, is known for his extraordinary dribbling skills and is often referred to as 'The Magician' for his ability to mesmerize defenders.

questions.question: Which player is known for his incredible goal-scoring ability and is often referred to as 'CR7'?
questions.explanation: Cristiano Ronaldo, a Portuguese forward, is known for his prolific goal-scoring ability and is often referred to as 'CR7' due to his initials and jersey number.
